benchmark_details.name: NLPre-PL
benchmark_details.overview: NLPre-PL is a newly proposed benchmark for evaluating and ranking natural language preprocessing systems for Polish, providing automated assessment and a publicly accessible leaderboard.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide a comprehensive evaluation and ranking system for NLPre tools focused on the Polish language.

data.source: Developed from existing Polish datasets including NKJP1M and PDB-UD.
data.annotation: Manually and consistently annotated based on the Morfeusz and Universal Dependencies tag sets.

methodology.calculation: Metrics are calculated based on standard evaluation scripts following the CoNLL shared task format.
methodology.interpretation: Higher F1 and aligned accuracy scores indicate better performance in NLPre tasks.
methodology.baseline_results: COMBO and Stanza achieved the highest F1 scores in evaluation.
methodology.validation: Benchmark results are validated against predefined test sets with hidden references to prevent result manipulation.
